text: The Official Monetary and Financial Institutions Forum (OMFIF) is an independent think tank organization concerned with central banking, economic policy, and public investment. OMFIF was co-founded in 2010 by David Marsh, who has subsequently served as its Chairman. Danae Kyriakopoulou is the OMFIF's Chief Economist and Director of Research. Meghnad Desai, Baron Desai is Chairman of the OMFIF Advisory Board. Michael Lafferty is a former co- chairman of OMFIF.
